## ISeqable interface

Interface for data types providing an [ISeq](./api.iseq.md) abstraction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ISeqable<T> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [seq()](./api.iseqable.seq.md) | Returns an [ISeq](./api.iseq.md) of the type's data or <code>undefined</code> if there're no values available. See [ISeq.next()](./api.iseq.next.md) |
